name: C-RAM Simulator: Air defense
description:
Now you can be a CIWS commander and defend your base from air attacks such as fighter jets, helicopters, armed and camicadze drones!
This is game is inspired by ARMA 3 mod!

Features:

1. Type of CIWS / Air Defense systems
* Phalanx C-RAM
* Millennium Single Turret CIWS
* Millennium Double Turret CIWS
* Phalanx SeaRAM
* Artemis
* Goalkeeper
* Phalanx SeaRAM
* Kashtan
* M242 Bushmaster
* IRON DOVE AA PGZ-95AA
* USZ SHILKA
* 2K22 TUNGUSKA
* ASELSAN KORKUT
* M113 MACHBET

3. Night Vision

4. Laser Guidance

5. 4 Different operation maps
* Defend base in Mountains
* Defend Aircraft carrier
* Defend From Drone Attacks
* Defend Randomly generated Island
* Defend Randomly generated forest

6. Types of Enemies
* 1 Type of enemy aircraft
* 2 Type of enemy Helicopters
* 3 Type of different Combat UAVS and camicadze Drones

7. Upgrade system to improve accuracy, fire rate and range.

8. Progress levels to get new army rank badges.

9. Two different control modes
* Joystick
* Touch

It is free and always will be! Enjoy commander!
